K14n192u_001:2112: tena taddviguṇodāraṃ jataṃ tasya maṇiṃ ca tat 1022
K14n192u_001:2113: ity evaṃ sa mahāsatvaḥ stūpe 'smin śaraṇāśritaḥ
K14n192u_001:2122: sārthaiḥ sārdhaṃ mahotsāhaṃ caran vanāntaraṃ yayau 1027

K14n192u_001:2134: auṣadhībhis tam ālipya sahasā svasthitaṃ vyadhāt 1033

K14n192u_001:2143: etatpuṇyaiś ca me gātraprakṣālanāmbunā pi ye
K14n192u_001:2144: spṛṣṭās te nirujāḥ puṣṭā bhaveyur vimalendriyāḥ 1038

K14n192u_001:2154: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā ciraṃ tasthau śubhe caran 1043

K14n192u_001:2207: iti vijñāya saṃsāre kartavyaṃ sukṛtaṃ sadā 1069

K14n192u_001:2209: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti ṣaḍgatiṣv api 1070
